short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Kelpi is an Amazon guide that will help sellers list and optimize their products on Amazon, by guiding them through the process.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Amazon sellers best friend, let Kelpi guide and help you list products faster on Amazon.
Managing your Amazon store can be very complicated and time consuming. Kelpi is AI powered and has been trained by Amazon experts with the purpose of helping sellers list their products and have them optimized for Amazon faster.  

All you require:
-Google Chrome
-Product URLs

What will you get:
*Save days of work (it takes an expert 2 hours to list 1 product) - get it done in 10min with Kelpi.
*Get your products optimized and found on Amazon
*Access How To guides and best in-class examples
*A+ content guide and design examples
*Amazon advertising support
